```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Graph Color Palettes

Are you looking for a highly contrasting color palette that works well in graphs?

Here is a collection of color palettes that I like to use.

```{r echo=FALSE}
bar_data <- tibble(item=c("A", "B", "C"), count=c(4,5,3))
ggplot(bar_data, aes(x=item, y=count, fill=item)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none")
```

More to come...
